plot timeseries given a path (or URL) to csv

Source: R/plot.R
plot_dygraph_timeseries.Rd

plot timeseries given a path (or URL) to csv

plot_dygraph_timeseries(
  csv_tv,
  title,
  y_label,
  x_label = "Year",
  v_label = y_label,
  filter = NULL,
  col_t = NULL,
  col_y = NULL,
  skip = 0,
  use_kmb = T,
  group_by = NULL,
  std_err = NULL
)

Arguments

csv_tv

csv path or URL with time and value
title

title of plot
y_label

label (eg units) for values on y axis
x_label

label for date/time on x axis
v_label

label for legend, defaults to y_label
filter

filter expression to limit rows
col_t

column name for time
col_y

column name for y
skip

rows to skip in csv header

Value

returns dygraph htmlwidget for populating modal window

Examples

plot_dygraph_timeseries(
  csv_tv  = 'http://oceanview.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/cciea_MM_pup_count.csv?time,mean_growth_rate',
  title   = 'Female sea lion pup growth rate',
  y_label = 'Mean growth rate')
